content: Our return policy allows you to return items within 14 days of delivery. To be eligible, items must be unused, in their original packaging, and with proof of purchase. Refunds are processed within 5 business days after inspection of the returned item.

We ship to all major cities in India, including Vijayawada. Standard Delivery takes 3-7 business days, and Express Delivery takes 1-3 business days. We offer free standard shipping on all orders over ₹1,000.

We provide warranties on many products. Electronics typically come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty, while accessories have a 6-month warranty. Please retain your invoice for any warranty claims. Apparel warranties are as specified by the brand.
You can reach our customer support team from Monday to Saturday, 9 AM to 8 PM IST. Email us at support@example.com or call us at +91-XXXXXXXXXX.
We accept a wide range of payment methods: Credit/Debit Cards (Visa, MasterCard, RuPay), UPI, Net Banking, PayPal, and Cash on Delivery (COD). COD is available for select products and pin codes.
Our online store, ABC E-Store, is open for ordering 24/7. Our customer support team is available Monday to Saturday, from 9 AM to 8 PM IST.
To track your order, log in to your account, go to 'My Orders,' and click 'Track Order.' You will also receive a tracking link via email and SMS once your order has been dispatched.
Orders can be canceled within 12 hours of placing them. To cancel, please contact our customer support team immediately with your order number.
If you receive a damaged product, please contact customer support within 48 hours of delivery. Include photos of the item and packaging, and we will arrange a replacement or refund.
Yes, we ship to select international locations. Please be aware that international delivery charges and customs duties may apply, which are calculated at checkout.
